document_data.mainbody:
Hilithimm Turnstone was a locksmith and retired warrior inhabiting Waterdeep, the City of Splendors, during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Hilithimm was the guildmaster for the Cellarers & Plumbers Guild circa 1357 DR. He held the title of "Master Plumber" within the guild and worked out of the Old Guildhallâ€“their headquarters on Gaustus Street in the Trades Ward.
